item.description:
You don't need to be a professional [ Beginner lessons ] Singles go. No partner necessary.
Tango Lesson 6:30 -8pm Dance all styles of dance 8-11:30pm $15 - Free pizza, coffee, tea, pastry & pop corn. Cash bar. A table is reserved for us.
The K and S lesson/dance is held on the 2nd floor of the Knights of Columbus hall by instuctors. The patrons are so friendly and help all of us learn. Dancers rotate so everyone gets to dance.
401-821-4108 www.kandsmusic.net Large wooden dance floor.
item.how_to_find_us: 2 Tables reserved for us with meetup signs/ phone numbers will be provided via e-mail

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Ballroom Dance with Beginner 90 Min.Tango Lesson
